idk wut im doing today maybe ill call some ppl up nd we'll hang out

im recording a demo tommrow night =] im soooo excited then im doing a photoshoot on the 3rd nd send the pics nd the cd into sony records i cant wait =]

today was ok i broke my phone =[ got if fixed for free =]

me nd dana might hang out tommrow night nd watch a movie cuz were cool

ah this entry is pointless

livejournal has died

heyy guys whats up...i gotta say that this summer is AMAZING.

i got back from the cruise like a month ago nd it was awesome i miss every1 soo much

the other day hung out with dana and gabby...good times good times lol we mite hang out again tommrow chill see a movie or somethin

im done later kiddies

quick entry
this summers been absolutely amazing...i miss every1 from the cruise big time 

went to danas houseyesterday nd we went swimming nd hung out with ppl from her block

going to cindy and lindsey's house in like a half hour nd going swimming gonna be awesome

alright im done later kiddies
wow...livejournal died nobody uses it anymore

whats good everyone? 

wednesday took the bio regents nd it was soo easy then after that dana,cindy,lindz,and gabby came to my house nd went swimming went on the trampoline nd i took them for a ride on my quad =] it was great...this summer is gonna be awesome i luv my girlies=]

went to fulmar road school again today helped out Genine clean up her classroom nd shit

ummm yea basically thats it 4 days till me nd jen<3 go on vacation for 2 weeks!!!! =]

later niggs

hey kiddies wuts good? 

today was pretty good studied bio for a little bit then went to my lil bros school nd helped out Janine cuz shes amazingly cool..i wish she stll worked at the beauty parlor i luv her...then i came home chilled for a lil

went to danas house before nd just got home..we walked aorund her street for like an hour or 2 talked about some certain bitches but w/e hu cares anymore...then went into her hosue wtahced the grudge then la madre picked me up at like 9:30

so now im watching the yankee game nd im getting pissed off cuz mariano is gonna lose the damn game i hate him

so wednesday i have bio regants then after that dana,lindz,cindy,nd possibly christina r coming over nd were gonna chill its gonna be the shit! i luv those girls!

alright im done niggs

-Kristina-

GIRLS. . .

WAIT FOR THE BOY WHO KISSES YOUR FOREHEAD . . .
. . . WHO WANTS TO SHOW YOU OFF TO THE WORLD WHEN YOU ARE IN YOUR SWEATS . . .
. . . WHO HOLDS YOUR HAND IN FRONT OF HIS FRIENDS . . .
. . . WHO THINKS YOU'RE JUST AS PRETTY WITHOUT MAKEUP ON.

WAIT FOR THE ONE WHO IS CONSTANTLY REMINDING YOU OF HOW MUCH HE CARES ABOUT YOU AND HOW LUCKY HE IS TO HAVE YOU.

WAIT FOR THE ONE WHO TURNS TO HIS FRIENDS AND SAYS, ". . . THAT'S HER."



GUYS . . .

FIND A GIRL WHO CALLS YOU BABE OR BABY FACE INSTEAD OF HOT OR SEXY . . .
. . . WHO CAN'T STAND IT WHEN YOU HANG UP ON HER . . .
. . . WHO WOULD SIT THERE FOR HOURS LOOKING INTO YOUR EYES . . .

WAIT FOR THE ONE WHO DOESN'T CARE WHAT YOU LOOK LIKE, BUT WHAT'S INSIDE COUNTS THE MOST . . .
. . . WHO LOOKS AT YOU WITH THE TWINKLE IN HER EYES AND KISSES YOU ON THE CHEEK INSTEAD OF THE LIPS . . .
. . . WHO WANTS TO BE WITH YOU IN PUBLIC . . .
. . . WHO MAKES YOU SMILE JUST BY KNOWING SHE LOVES/LIKES YOU BACK.

WAIT FOR THE GIRL WHO IS A CONSTANT REMINDER OF YOUR HAPPINESS AND JOY.

ok so i took this quiz nd i had to put dfferent names of people that reminded me of the different colors nd foods nd stuff that was written -- and this is what i got..

What You Really Think Of Your Friends

Danniela is your soulmate.
You truly love Dana.
You consider Resa your true friend.
You know that Christina S. is always thinking of you.
You'll remember Lindsey for the rest of your life.
You secretly think Christina R. is creative, charming, and a bit too dramatic at times.
You secretly think that Jen is colorful, impulsive, and a total risk taker.
You secretly think that Cindy is loyal and trustworthy to you. And that Cindy changes lovers faster than underwear.
You secretly think Gabby is shy and nonconfrontational. And that Gabby has a hidden internet romance.
What Do You Think of Your Friends?

went swimming before cuz it was so flippping hott out

came home nd i asked my mom is i could go to the beauty parlor tommrow to get another piercing nd she pulled out a bag nd she said i could either get the piercing or w/e is in that bag...so i picked the bag cuz i could just get the piercing like wenver idc if she says no...so anyways i opened the bag nd there was an ipod in it!!! i was flipping out cuz i had been begging for one for like ever she got me a mini blue one my favorite color:) im so happy!

so after i got out of the pool i went to rich's house nd we chilled talked about some shit really caught up on things hes a good kid

so saturday i gotta babysit gonna make some money nd sunday im chillen with my cuzzin jen because i miss her so much! ahh jen 1 more week till the cruise gonna be crazyyy ;) lol

wow today was a really good day like i havent had a good day in a while

so today was stephs <3 birthday nd i luv that girl!

today was the seniors last day i was so upset im gonna miss them so much =[

school is almost over!!!:
italian:textbook?
study:went to ms. fioranti with lindz instead of staying in the study cuz we were bored nd then we talked about fireworks with her?? yea it was so random lol
bio: i got a 70 on my test holy shit i like screamed in class i was sooo happy nd now every1 is probly reading this and going 70? thats not that good of a grade but for bio it is...i think this is my 2nd test that ive past this year? lol o nd i got my project and i got a 100 on it bitchhhess!
lunch:the fries were sooo good today nd omg yesterday at lunch i was dieing like me dana kim resa and christina couldnt stop laughing i was telling a story nd all of a sudden i just go "he wears a diaper...but its not funny!!" nd i mean u had to be there but like idk we were dieing people thot we were so weird lol

heck yes im gonna be famous!! but ill be killed by a stalker i wonder hu hehe so today was pretty good woke up at 10:30 came downstairs did h.w then i went out with my family nd me nd my mom went to the coldstone creamery ice cream placee omg they have such good ice cream so then dae called and asked if i wanted to hang out so i went to her house at around like 5ish and we went outside in the rain cuz were kewl like that then we saw erich and we kicked around an ice tea can for no reason at all then we went back inside chilled for a while and ate food cuz food is amazing and watch not another teen movie lol then my mom came picked me up at like 8ish ah desperate housewives finale is on tonight!!! i cant wait its gonna be mad good ok im out kiddies ex oh -Kristina-

wow girls in this school r reall fucking bitches like i cant stand them anymore nd they need to grow up big time nd they need to stop thinking that there hot shit cuz there fucking not

so yea anyways today ok it started off shitty then i calmed down nd then at the end of the day before softball shit had to start up again but w/e i dont care anymore like i gotta stop caring about shit like this
italian: mr. cartularo is gay
study: me nd manda got out of it nd did communit service lol
bio lab: ugh double period nd it sucked but w/e we like did nothing
lunch: holy shit dan tracy was passing out energy drinks nd i chugged down 4 of them nd holy shit was i hyper like everybody was going nuts in the cafteria because every1 was having like 6 or 7 each
math: ms. vandeveld got mad at me nd cindy cuz we couldnt sit still and we couldnt shut up or stop laughing cuz we had to many of the drinks =] hehe
chorus: wow keith like pulled down my pants a lil by accident i flipped out on him lol nd then he decided to be gay nd he kept doing nd then alex jumped in i finally jst like lef5t and sat with tricia nd lindz lol
global: yes the dyke wasnt here!!
english: took a vocab test nd then did romeo nd juleit

ok well before i flipped out cuz i lost my fone so i drove to school at like 9:00 nd the janiter let me i was so happy sum1 was there lol

ok im out kiddies im gonna try to call trishy cuz i luv her nd im hoping that she'll make me feel better

-Kristina-

heyyy..well today was pretty good it dragged on for like ever tho 

had a softball game today nd wow surprise surprise we lost again but i gotta say the whole team did pretty good today...i pitched tho whole game today nd i usually always put myself down nd say i did horrible nd its all my fault but i have to say i did amazing today nd my arm wasnt getting tired nd i wasnt getting frustrated at all,im so proud of myself hehe nd i love dana trani and lauren infantino because dana is the bestest catcher EVERRR and lauren is the bestest firstbaseman EVERR!!!!! u guys r the greatest...wuv u bothh

so after the game me and steph went to portofinos nd we havent talked that much in a while nd we seriously jst like caught up on EVERYTHING shes so funny i luv that girl she makes me laugh so much

ok well im out kiddies

-Kristina-

so today was ok boring but w/e at least today i wasnt in the worst mood

i have to start learning words to the songs my singing coach told me to learn nd i jst like will forget to do it or ill jst like wont feel like doing it...well i picked out new songs today anyways im gonna sing behind hazel eyes-kelly clarkson, i turn to you-christina aguilara, listen to your heart-D.H.T and only hope-mandy moore...i jst gotta learn i turn to you but w/e i dont care ill learn em sooner or later...i cant wait till im 16 cuz i cant wait till i go on american idol im so excited me lauren nd christina are going on it cuz were kewl like that and were gonna do awesome cuz we all have amazing voices!!! hehehe

so tommrow=softball practice <33 which we so totally need cuz so many of the girls on this team suck big time nd the coaches see that nd they still cancel practices even tho they know that alot of the girls need the practice wow but yea there stupid anywayss nd they suck at coaching.... ahhh last game we played carmel nd they kicked our asses but w/e hu cares lauren hit a grandslam!! ah i wuv her so much nd omfg the pictcher had noo teeethh we couldnt stop laughing!...game on thursday against john jay!!! every1 come!

ok im out kiddies

-Kristina-

hey guys yea today was ok i cant stand school anymore onlylike 15 more days till im outta here and i wont have to deal with all this shit anymore...so today had:

gym-played matball...cant wait till we play softball...softball=love <333
bio-handed in my amazing project nd took some quiz thingy...easy
lunch-talked with dae lis nd resa nd the juniors were coming around asking us to vote for them
religion-that class is sooo gay i hate it its so boring...i played lemons with christina tho funny game lol

WAYS TO MAKE A GIRL SMILE:

Hold her hand at any moment even if it just for a second.
Kiss her on the neck.
Leave her voice messages to wake up to.
Always tell her you love her at any and all times, but only if you mean it.
When she is upset hold her tight and tell her how much she means to you.
Recognize the small things . . . they usally mean the most.
Sing to her no matter how horrible your voice is.
Pick her over all the other girls you hang out with.
Write her notes. {she loves them}
Introduce her to family and friends as your girlfriend, if she is.
Play with her hair.
Pick her up, Tickle her, and play-wrestle with her.
Sit in the park and just talk to her.
Tell her funny jokes, tell her stupid jokes, just tell her jokes.
Throw pebbles at her window in the middle of the night just because you missed her.
Carve your names into a tree.
If she's mad at you, kiss her.
Give her piggyback rides.
Bring her flowers just because.
Treat her the same around your FRIENDS as you do when your alone.
Look her in the eyes and smile.
Kiss her in the rain.
If you're in love with her TELL HER.

i dont care anymore....*

~!)im out(!~

-Kristina-

im gonna make this entry short...today was depressing and all i have to say is that i love lauren infantino and christina rueperto so so so much...u girls really helped me out today i love you girls so much....u guys r the best!!

after school i had softball practice...can you say pointless wow yea these coaches dont know wut there doing god i hate them but w/e doesnt matter next year ill be on JV and i wont have to deal with that shit

so after practice i was wating for stephs mom to come cause she was driving me home nd i waited outside with justin chris mike gumby matt will collen and kim love them all me nd kim practiced pitching again nd then guys jst sat around watching us nd omg at yesterday at our game me steph nd shannon were on base nd lauren hit a grand slam woot woot!!! i luv that girl amazinggg player

so i came home did h.w practiced skateboarding came back in relaxed nd shit

yea so now im mad tired barely go any sleep other nite so im out

last friday was mandas sweet 16 it was so much fun i saw danniele there nd i havent seen her in like forever!!! i also so my favorite person in the whole world jen! i love them both i was feeling so shitty wen i got there nd they both got me in the greatest mood i wuv them so muchhh!

ugh softball practice tommrow but im really glad i do cuz i havent been to practice in a while nd i miss it so i cant waitt im hoping sooner or later this team will actually win a game...or at least lose a game were we dont lose by like 20 runs?? lol

yesterday i went to the amusement parks with ant nd nick nd had an awesome time!!! nick forced me to go onto the hulk nd i was sooo scared...glad he made me tho cuz it was awesomee...then went out to dinner with them nd then we went to go play some games nd nick "owned" me in the shooting game thingy..so yeah i lost but he got mee a dolphin! hehe

i don't understand.
if you love me, 
if you realized how much i do for you,
if you realized that i'm not making up all the things that i say to you,

28 ways to make a girl smile*

1 . Tell her she is beautiful, not hott, fine or sexy. 

2 . Hold her hand at any moment even if it just for a second.

3 . Kiss her on the neck.

4 . Leave her voice messages to wake up to.

5 . Always tell her you love her at any and all times, but only if you mean it.

6 . When she is upset hold her tight and tell her how much she means to you.

7 . Recognize the small things . . . they usally mean the most.

8 . Call her sweetie. {not baby}

9 . Sing to her no matter how horrible your voice is.

10 . Pick her over all the other girls you hang out with.

11 . Write her notes. {she loves them}

12 . Introduce her to family and friends as your girlfriend, if she is.

13 . Play with her hair.

14 . Pick her up, Tickle her,  and play-wrestle with her.

15 . Sit in the park and just talk to her.

16 . Tell her funny jokes, tell her stupid jokes, just tell her jokes.

17 . Throw pebbles at her window in the middle of the night just because you missed her.

18 . Let her fall asleep in your arms.

19 . Carve your names into a tree.

20 . If she's mad at you, kiss her.

21 . Give her piggyback rides.

22 . Bring her flowers just because.

23 . Treat her the same around your FRIENDS as you do when your alone.

24 . Look her in the eyes and smile.

25 . Let her take as many pictures of you as she wants.

26 . Slow dance with her, even if there isn't any music playing.

27 . Kiss her in the rain.

28 . If you're in love with her TELL HER.
